recently ras mediated raf-1 activation has been shown to be dependent on calcium/calmodulin dependent protein kinase ii ( camk-ii ) which phosphorylates raf-1 at s338 in some experimental stimulation conditions [ egf , fetal bovine serum ( fbs ) treatment ] . ++++ raf-1 activation by ras has been shown to be dependent on the prohibitin protein , a ubiquitously expressed protein which may also serve as a chaperonin protein [ xref_bibr ] .
